panels.title: Instruction usage in most recent upgrade

panels.description: The total number of blocks in the ledger + archives 20 seconds ago, minus the current number of blocks in the index. If this value is >0, it means the index has had 20s to process all the blocks but has not managed - it may be stuck.

targets.expr: sum by (value, token) (ledger_total_blocks{ic="mercury",token="icp"} offset 20s) - sum by (value, token)(index_number_of_blocks{ic="mercury",token="icp"})

panels.title: (Ledger and Archive 20s ago) vs Index
Total number of allowances in the ledger
Total number of accounts in the ledger balance store
Age of most recent ledger block
Instruction usage in most recent upgrade

panels.description: The total number of blocks in the ledger + archives 20 seconds ago, minus the current number of blocks in the index. If this value is >0, it means the index has had 20s to process all the blocks but has not managed - it may be stuck.

targets.expr: sum by (value, token) (ledger_total_transactions{token=~"${ck_token}"} offset 20s) - sum by (value, token)(index_number_of_blocks{token=~"${ck_token}"})

panels.title: (Ledger and Archive 20s ago) vs Index

Instruction usage in most recent upgrade

panels.description: The total number of blocks in the ledger + archives 20 seconds ago, minus the current number of blocks in the index. If this value is >0, it means the index has had 20s to process all the blocks but has not managed - it may be stuck.

targets.expr: label_replace(sum by (value, token) (ledger_total_transactions{token=~"sns-${sns_token}"} offset 20s) - sum by (value, token)(index_number_of_blocks{token=~"sns-${sns_token}"}), "token", "$1", "token", "^sns-(.*)")
